name: Poetry and Violence
description:
Aster is a normal girl from normal world, until one day she finds herself in a strange world as if drawn in crayons. What's even more strange, after finding out a poem book, she finds it in herself to lift a mallet her size (and she doesn't even like poetry). Which is  lucky, since she needs to get out of sticky situations and defend herself against... the eyes?

Play as a girl in a flower dress wielding a huge mallet. Have fun.

Meet the team

Milla: Production / Animation / Level design / Writing / Code
Alessandro: Art lead / Sprites / UI
Pontus: Programming lead / Systems
Tiarnan: Tilesets

How to play

Arrow keys to move
X to jump
C to interact
Z to hit with the mallet
P for poem book
